info.name: Khabeer Backend - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete Postman collection for Khabeer service marketplace backend. Features simplified provider authentication flow, admin panel, orders management, payments, search, ratings, offers, and file upload capabilities.

request.description: Creates a new order. If there's a valid offer for this provider/service combination, it will be automatically applied and the discount will be shown in the response.
This endpoint is for documentation/testing. Real tracking should be done via WebSocket connection to ws://localhost:3000/location-tracking
